reg_pit.title: Multilateral Instrument 51-105 Issuers Quoted in the U.S. Over-the-Counter Markets

change.changenote: Section 1 in the definition of "OTC issuer", subparagraph (b) (viii) was added by BC Reg 208/2015, effective November 17, 2015.
Section 5 (a) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 139/2023, effective June 9, 2023.

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: National Instrument 13-101 System for Electronic Document Analysis and Retrieval (SEDAR) that apply to an electronic filer, despite section 2.1 of that Instrument;

change.changenote: Section 7 (2) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 139/2023, effective June 9, 2023.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: The OTC reporting issuer must file the registration statement in electronic format under section 2.2 of National Instrument 13-101 System for Electronic Document Analysis and Retrieval (SEDAR).

change.changenote: Section 8 (3) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 139/2023, effective June 9, 2023.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: The OTC reporting issuer must file the notice in electronic format in accordance with National Instrument 13-101 System for Electronic Document Analysis and Retrieval (SEDAR).

change.changenote: Section 16 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 106/2016, effective May 9, 2016.

bcl:section.bcl:text: Section 4.2 of Multilateral Instrument 62-104 Take-Over Bids and Issuer Bids does not apply to a take-over bid for an OTC reporting issuer for 2 years after the ticker-symbol date.

change.changenote: Form 51-105F3A (page 1) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 139/2023, effective June 9, 2023.
